title: Error 004
body:
Hey there. My client is having a Error 004.
Someone can help me with that? :(

replies.body: Typically that 004 error code means that League wasn't able to access the files it needs properly from some permission issues. Run through this [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those setup, but definitely let me know if that didn't help!
